{{unsourced|date=December 2010}} [[File:TV3 logo 2009.svg|150px|right]] '''Viasat 3''' is a [[Hungary|Hungarian]] TV channel. It was originally named Alfa TV, but when in 2000 the station was bought by Swedish [[Modern Times Group|MTG]] its name was changed. It began broadcasting as Viasat 3 in October 2000.
Viasat 3 aired Hungary's first [[Reality Show]] in 2001 called '''A BÃ¡r''' (The Bar).
Viasat 3 showed the [[UEFA Champions League]] until [[TV6]] was created.
==External links== * [http://www.viasat3.hu Official Site]
